page.title: 15A Survey of Scartho. Part 1.
page.content: {Landscape. The landscape in our area consists of{housing estates, farmland, {recreation areas,}a few{shops}dotted around and a small amount of {wasteland.}The{farmland}is on the outskirts of{Grimsby. {Housing. About{30%}of the houses in our area are{council houses.}Along the main roads the houses are usually {detatched}though most people live in {semi-detatched houses.}The majority have three bedrooms. Many of the houses have fair sized gardens and most of the{detatched houses}have {garages.}Most people live within a reasonable walking distance of the {shops.}There are in our area a number of{flats}especially built for{old {people.}There is a great variation in the style of{private housing,
